segments.text: Excuse me , do you speak English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , do you need some help ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , yes . Could you show me how to use my key card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sure . You need to put your card in the slot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s right . Then wait for the green light and turn the handle .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , it ’ s open . Thank you very much .
segments.speaker: S1
